description: The battery pass describes information collected during the lifecycle of a battery

Text.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

AttachmentEntity.description: Entity encapsulating the details of a attachment for the battery

DocumentCharacteristic.description: Set of documents containing the description of battery components

packagingInstructions.description: Instructions for safely packaging batteries is describing a business requirement.

transportationInstructions.description: Instructions for safely transporting batteries is describing a business requirement.

vehicleDismantlingProcedure.description: Document containing the vehicle dismantling procedure is describing a regulatory requirement.

batteryDismantlingProcedure.description: Document containing the battery dismantling procedure is describing a regulatory requirement.

safetyMeasures.description: Safety measures document(s) is describing a regulatory requirement.

testReportsResults.description: Results of test reports which prove that the battery fulfills this regulation and its delegated regulations is describing a regulatory requirement.

declarationOfConformity.description: Declaration of conformity (CE) is describing a regulatory requirement.

responsibleSourcing.description: Document/Certificates on organizations compliance to ethical business practices

PhoneNumberTrait.description: Constraint to allow only numbers, whitespaces and an optional leading + sign.

EMailTrait.description: Regular expression for mail address as defined in W3C (see https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/input.html#valid-e-mail-address)

ContactCharacteristic.description: Characteristic describing information on how to contact an organization

phoneNumber.description: Phone number with country and area code

faxNumber.description: Fax number with country and area code

ThoroughfareTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a thoroughfare

Text0.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

ThoroughfareEntity.description: Entity for a thoroughfare which consists of a type, value and number.

technicalKey.description: Technical key of a thoroughfare. As specified by BPDM, this can be a "STREET" or a different type.

value.description: Value of a thoroughfare, e.g. name of a street.

number.description: Number of a thoroughfare. As used differently in international context, this number can contain both numerical and alphanumerical values

ThoroughfareCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a thoroughfare which can consist of a type (e.g. "STREET"), value (e.g. "Bernstraße") and number (e.g. "45"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.

LocalityTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a locality

LocalityEntity.description: Entity for a thoroughfare which consists of a type, value and number.

value.description: Value of a locality, e.g. name of a city ("Mannheim").

LocalityCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a locality which belongs to an address and which consists of a type (e.g. "CITY") and value (e.g. "Mannheim"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.

PremiseTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a premise

PremiseEntity.description: Entity for a premise which consists of a type (technical key) and a value

value.description: Value of a premise, e.g. name or designation of a particular site

PremiseCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a premise which consists of a technical key (e.g. "BUILDING" or "OTHER") and a value (e.g. "Werk 1").

PostalDeliveryPointTechnicalKeyCharacter.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a postal delivery point

PostalDeliveryPointEntity.description: Entity for a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key and a value.

technicalKey.description: Technical key of a postal delivery point

value.description: Value of a postal delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate

PostalDeliveryPointCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key (e.g. "MAILBOX" or "OTHER") and a value. Model follows the specification of BPDM.

CountryTrait.description: Regular expression for designation of a short name of a country as defined in ISO 3166-2

CountryCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of a country belonging to an address

PostCodeTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for the technical key of a post code

PostCodeEntity.description: Entity for a postcode which consists of a type plus a value

value.description: The value of a post code

technicalKey.description: The technical key of a post code

PostCodeCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a postcode which can consist of a type (e.g. "REGULAR" for zip codes) and a value (e.g. "68161\12"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.

PostalAddress.description: A characteristic to express the postal adress and which is intended to be referenced by other aspects

premise.description: Premise of an address, e.g. a specific "BUILDING" but can also be used for naming a particular site

postalDeliveryPoint.description: Delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate

name.description: Name of the manufacturer is describing a regulatory requirement.

PowerFadeCharacteristic.description: The decrease over time and upon usage in the amount of power that a battery can deliver at the rated voltage is describing a regulatory requirement.

BatteryPowerCharacteristic.description: Characteristic to describe the power (W) properties of the battery.

maximumAllowedBatteryPower.description: Maximum allowed battery power (W) of the battery is describing a business requirement.

powerFade.description: Maximum allowed battery power (W) of the battery is describing a business requirement.

powerCapabilityAt20Charge.description: Power (capability) at 20% state of charge. Description from the regulation is describing a regulatory requirement.

powerCapabilityAt80Charge.description: Power (capability) at 80% state of charge. Description from the regulation is describing a regulatory requirement.

originalPowerCapability.description: Performance ability of the high voltage battery i.e. the amount of energy that a battery is capable to provide over a given period of time is describing a regulatory requirement.

originalPowerCapabilityLimits.description: Performance ability of the high voltage battery according to limits i.e. how much power it can provide within given limits is describing a regulatory requirement.

VoltCharacteristic.description: Value of the voltage the battery is rated for

BatteryVoltageCharacteristic.description: Characteristic to describe the voltage (V) properties of the battery.

minVoltage.description: Value of the minimal voltage the battery is rated for is describing a regulatory requirement.

nominalVoltage.description: Value of the nominal voltage the battery is rated for is describing a regulatory requirement.

maxVoltage.description: Value of the maximum voltage the battery is rated for is describing a regulatory requirement.

RatedCapacityCharacteristic.description: The total number of ampere-hours (Ah) that can be withdrawn from a fully charged battery under specific conditions is describing a regulatory requirement.

CapacityFadeCharacteristic.description: The decrease over time and upon usage in the amount of charge that a battery can deliver at the rated voltage, with respect to the original rated capacity declared by the manufacturer is describing a regulatory requirement.

MilliohmCharacteristic.description: The resistance offered by the cell in the flow of the current

OhmCharacterisitic.description: Total internal resistance in a battery pack

PercentCharacteristic.description: Increase in internal resistance of a battery pack over a period of time

InternalResistanceCharacteristic.description: Internal resistance in a battery cell or pack is describing a regulatory requirement.

cellInternalResistance.description: The resistance offered by the cell in the flow of the current

packInternalResistance.description: Total internal resistance in a battery pack is describing a regulatory requirement.

packInternalResistanceIncrease.description: Increase in internal resistance of a battery pack over a period of time is describing a regulatory requirement.

CapacityThresholdExhaustionCharacterisit.description: Capacity threshold for exhaustion as percentage value is describing a regulatory requirement.

MaximumAllowedBatteryEnergyCharacteristi.description: Characteristic to describe the energy (Wh) properties of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

EnergyRoundtripEfficiency.description: Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage is describing a regulatory requirement.

EnergyRoundtripEfficiencyChangeCharacter.description: Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage after 50% of life of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

BatteryEnergyCharacterisitc.description: Characteristic to describe the energy (kWh) properties of the battery.

maximumAllowedBatteryEnergy.description: Maximum allowed battery energy (Wh) of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

energyRoundtripEfficiency.description: Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage is describing a regulatory requirement.

energyRoundtripEfficiencyChange.description: Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage is describing a regulatory requirement.

RatioMaximumAllowedBatteryPowerAndMaximu.description: Ratio between maximum allowed battery power (W) and battery energy (Wh) is describing a regulatory requirement.

ElectrochemicalPropertiesCharacteristic.description: Electrochemical characteristics to describe a battery

batteryPower.description: Characteristic to describe the power (W) properties of the battery.

ratedCapacity.description: The total number of ampere-hours (Ah) that can be withdrawn from a fully charged battery under specific conditions is describing a regulatory requirement.

capacityFade.description: The decrease over time and upon usage in the amount of charge that a battery can deliver at the rated voltage, with respect to the original rated capacity declared by the manufacturer is describing a regulatory requirement.

internalResistance.description: Internal resistance in a battery cell or pack is describing a regulatory requirement.

capacityThresholdExhaustion.description: Capacity threshold for exhaustion as percentage value is describing a regulatory requirement.

batteryEnergy.description: Characteristic to describe the energy (kWh) properties of the battery.

ratioMaximumAllowedBatteryPowerAndMaximu.description: Ratio between maximum allowed battery power (W) and battery energy (Wh) is describing a regulatory requirement.

MillimetreCharacteristic.description: A measurment for the length/width/height of an item.

KilogramCharacteristic.description: A measurement for the weight of an item.

length.description: Length of the item is describing a business requirement.

width.description: Width of the item is describing a business requirement.

height.description: Height of the item is describing a business requirement.

weight.description: Weight of the item is describing a regulatory requirement.

StateOfHealthCharacteristic.description: Evidence/Certificate of the health evaluation of a battery for its use following repurposing or remanufacturing operations is describing a business requirement.

StateOfChargeCharacteristic.description: The value of the state of charge of the battery at the end of life i.e. when entering recycling scheme is describing a business requirement.

StateOfBatteryCharacteristic.description: The condition of the battery at the end of life i.e. when entering recycling scheme

stateOfHealth.description: Evidence/Certificate of the health evaluation of a battery for its use following repurposing or remanufacturing operations is describing a business requirement.

stateOfCharge.description: The value of the state of charge of the battery at the end of life i.e. when entering recycling scheme is describing a business requirement.

statusBattery.description: Status of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement. Value list provided by the regulators.

BatteryIdentificationCharacteristic.description: Information to identify a specific battery.

batteryType.description: Battery type as described by the contents of the battery e.g. cell chemistry is describing a regulatory requirement.

batteryModel.description: Battery type as described by the contents of the battery e.g. cell chemistry is describing a regulatory requirement.

batteryIDDMCCode.description: Digital Matrix Code (DMC) of the battery i.e. serial number allowing for unequivocal identification of a battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

Datestamp.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

ManufacturingCharacteristic.description: Information about the manufacturing process of a battery

dateOfManufacturing.description: Manufacturing date of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

materialPercentageMassFractionCharacteri.description: Percentage mass fraction of a material

MaterialNameAndWeightAndPercentageMassFr.description: Entity to bundle a material's name, weight and percentage of mass.

materialPercentageMassFraction.description: Percentage mass fraction of a material.

CathodeActiveMaterialsCharacterisitic.description: The total amount of valuable materials contained in CAM material: Nickel, Cobalt, Lithium.

RecyclateContentActiveMaterialsCharacter.description: List of recovered Recyclate Content in Active Material Recycled is describing a regulatory requirement. The following materials have to be reported on as a minimium: Cobalt, Lithium, Nickel, Lead

AnodeActiveMaterialsCharacteristic.description: The total amount of valuable materials contained in Anode: graphite

CathodeCompositionOtherCharacteristic.description: The composition or materials contained in the Cathode is describing a regulatory requirement.

AnodeCompositionOtherCharacteristic.description: The composition or materials contained in the anode is describing a regulatory requirement.

ElectrolyteCompositionCharacteristic.description: List of materials contained in the electrolyte is describing a regulatory requirement.

CellChemistryCharacteristic.description: Information about the the cell chemistry of a battery cell

cathodeActiveMaterials.description: The total amount of valuable materials contained in CAM material: Nickel, Cobalt, Lithium.

recyclateContentActiveMaterials.description: List of recovered Recyclate Content in Active Material Recycled is describing a regulatory requirement. The following materials have to be reported on as a minimium: Cobalt, Lithium, Nickel, Lead

anodeActiveMaterials.description: The total amount of valuable materials contained in Anode: graphite

cathodeCompositionOther.description: The composition or materials contained in the Cathode is describing a regulatory requirement.

anodeCompositionOther.description: The composition or materials contained in the anode is describing a regulatory requirement.

electrolyteComposition.description: List of materials contained in the electrolyte is describing a regulatory requirement.

ComponentsSupplierEntity.description: Entity encapsulating the details of a components supplier

ComponentsSupplierCharacteristic.description: Contact details of the suppliers of replacement parts / spare parts is describing a regulatory requirement.

ComponentsPartNumberList.description: A list of the unique serial numbers of the different parts of a battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

componentsSupplier.description:
Contact details of the suppliers of replacement parts / spare parts is describing a regulatory requirement. Available fields should be like:
Name - Street - Number - ZIP Code - City - State - Country - Phone - Fax - Email - Website

componentsPartNumber.description: The unique serial numbers of the different parts of a battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

CompositionOfBatteryCharacteristic.description: Full composition of battery is describing a business requirement.

CriticalRawMaterialsCharacteristic.description: List of critical raw materials (CRM) as specified by EU in a battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

CompositionCharacteristic.description: Information about the composition of a battery and the combination of materials is describing a business requirement.

compositionOfBattery.description: Full composition of battery is describing a business requirement.

criticalRawMaterials.description: List of critical raw materials (CRM) as specified by EU in a battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

CO2FootprintTotalCharacteristic.description: The total carbon footprint of the battery, calculated as kg of carbon dioxide equivalent is describing a regulatory requirement.

TemperatureRangeCharacterisitic.description: The lower range of temperature the battery can withstand when not in use is describing a regulatory requirement.

TemperatureRangeIdleStateCharacterisitic.description: The range of temperature the battery can withstand when not in use is describing a regulatory requirement.

temperatureRangeIdleStateLowerLimit.description: The lower range of temperature the battery can withstand when not in use is describing a regulatory requirement.

temperatureRangeIdleStateUpperLimit.description: The upper range of temperature the battery can withstand when not in use is describing a regulatory requirement.

WarrantyPeriodCharacterisitic.description: Commercial warranty period of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

CycleLifeTestCRateCharacterisitc.description: C-rate of Relevant Cycle-life Test is describing a regulatory requirement.

CycleLifeTestDepthOfDischargeCharacteris.description: Depth of discharge in the cycle-life test is describing a regulatory requirement.

ExpectedLifetime.description: Expected battery lifetime expressed in cycles, and reference test used is describing a regulatory requirement.

BatteryCycleLifeCharacteristic.description: Characteristic describing the cycle life of a battery

cycleLifeTestCRate.description: C-rate of Relevant Cycle-life Test is describing a regulatory requirement.

cycleLifeTestDepthOfDischarge.description: Depth of discharge in the cycle-life test is describing a regulatory requirement.

expectedLifetime.description: Expected battery lifetime expressed in cycles, and reference test used is describing a regulatory requirement.

document.description: Set of documents containing the description of battery components

manufacturer.description: Legal entity which sells and invoices the battery

electrochemicalProperties.description: Electrochemical properties of an electrochemical energy storage

stateOfBattery.description: The condition of the battery at the end of life i.e. when entering recycling scheme

batteryIdentification.description: Information to identify a specific battery.

manufacturing.description: Information about the manufacturing process of a battery

datePlacedOnMarket.description: Date on which vehicle is produced i.e. when battery is put in the market or production date of the vehicle is describing a regulatory requirement.

cellChemistry.description: Information about the cell chemistry of a battery cell

composition.description: Information about the composition of a battery and the combination of materials is describing a business requirement.

cO2FootprintTotal.description: The total carbon footprint of the battery, calculated as kg of carbon dioxide equivalent is describing a regulatory requirement.

temperatureRangeIdleState.description: The range of temperature the battery can withstand when not in use is describing a regulatory requirement.

warrantyPeriod.description: Commercial warranty period of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.

batteryCycleLife.description: Property describing the cycle life of a battery
